programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: When multiple victims' bodies are dumped around Louisiana's bayou area, a task force is formed to catch a killer who police believe may have strangled over 20 men.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Police in Hartford, Conn., investigate a string of ruthless killings in the Asylum Hill area committed by a killer with a devastating mark that leaves his victims nearly unrecognizable.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A serial sniper terrorizes the entire D.C. metro area by discreetly targeting random victims out in public and in plain sight.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: In 1990, a serial killer terrorizes the University of Florida's campus, killing five students in under four days; the Gainesville Ripper leaves behind a crime scene where all the victims have been stabbed but the females have been posed like dolls.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: In New Jersey four bodies are found dismembered, bagged, and thrown in roadside garbage cans; the "Last Call Killer" hunted his victims openly in piano bars but no one suspected he could be hiding in plain sight, working as a local nurse.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Dallas police discover three women murdered with their eyes surgically removed; police believe they have a deranged doctor on the loose until two rookie cops find themselves on the trail of a man with a talent for taxidermy and a hatred for women.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A killer hijacks the highways of Sacramento as several women are found strangled with their clothing cut into precise but odd patterns; a survivor leads police to a sports car driving deviant posing as a good samaritan to poach potential victims.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: When the Hillside Stranglers are caught police realize they still have another serial killer running rampant in Los Angeles; he tortures and toys with his model victims while keeping pieces of their jewelry as he snaps their last photo ever.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Texas authorities have a killer riding the rails and leaving a literal trail of bread crumbs after eating at victims' tables; when more murders are linked, the FBI names a Most Wanted suspect and a national manhunt for The Railroad Killer ensues.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Minnesota police hunt for a killer caller who confesses to a string of murders in a chilling, high-pitched voice, begging for forgiveness; no one can identify him until one woman survives a brutal attack.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: In the summer of 1976, the NYPD are chasing a man shooting at couples in parked cars with a gigantic, .44 caliber handgun; he taunts the city with terrifying letters until police get a lead about a suspect who has shot a neighbor's dog.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Phoenix Coldon
programme.desc: Phoenix Coldon vanishes; investigative reporter, Shawndrea Thomas, and retired deputy Police Chief Joe Delia attempt to unravel the mysterious unsolved case in the hope of finding justice for Phoenix.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Phoenix Coldon
programme.desc: Joe and Shawndrea follow up on a handful of Phoenix sightings since her disappearance and begin to question whether she'd been lured into a new life more dangerous than she could have anticipated; a surprising lead goes to an unexpected locale.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Susan Cox Powell
programme.desc: A young mother in Utah vanishes and the only suspect, her husband, acts suspiciously; Stephanie Bauer examines never-before-seen home video recordings that shed light on the dramatic events surrounding the disappearance of Susan Cox Powell.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Susan Cox Powell
programme.desc: A defensive husband flees justice after the disappearance of his wife drags both of their families down deeper into destruction and tragedy.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Crystal Rogers
programme.desc: Crystal Rogers, mother of five, vanishes, leaving her car abandoned in Bardstown, Ky.; a year later her father is shot dead while searching for her; there are multiple cases in a small town shrouded in secrets, and haunted by unsolved killings.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Crystal Rogers
programme.desc: Stephanie and Dwayne look through Tommy Ballard's box of papers and evidence in Crystal's case.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Crystal Rogers
programme.desc: The FBI grills the brother of Crystal's boyfriend, Nick Houck, a Bardstown police officer; Stephanie and Dwayne follow a search of a lake where cadaver dogs pick up a scent; exploring the scene of a deadly ambush on the Bluegrass Parkway.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Crystal Rogers
programme.desc: An FBI profiler offers chilling insights on a potential killer; family members of Bardstown's other victims speak; a mysterious white car is possibly linked to Crystal's disappearance.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Crystal Rogers
programme.desc: With the first anniversary of Tommy Ballard's killing approaching, Stephanie and Dwayne dive deeper into the unsolved cases after a new witness steps forward; an unexpected new lead takes them in an unforeseen -- and intriguing -- direction.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Crystal Rogers
programme.desc: Stephanie and Dwayne speak with an informant who shares new information about the crimes in Bardstown; they follow up on the informant's claims and discover potential new details unknown to investigators.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Maura Murray
programme.desc: Journalist Maggie Freleng searches for answers in the 2004 disappearance of a nursing student following a car crash in New Hampshire.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Maura Murray
programme.desc: Maggie investigates reasons why Maura Murray secretly drove to New Hampshire and never came home, including a possible pregnancy or an emotional phone call with her sister.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Maura Murray
programme.desc: There are questions about happened to Maura after she crashed on a rural road in New Hampshire: did she run into the woods, hop into a car with someone she knew and escape to a new life in Canada, or worse, hitch a ride with a dangerous stranger.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Maura Murray
programme.desc: New Hampshire's law enforcement community keeps their findings of Maura's case close to the chest; Maggie explores the theories related to a police conspiracy, hoping to break down a decade-long code of silence.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Maura Murray
programme.desc: Killers and kidnappers are Maggie's focus as she works to find out if Maura Murray was the victim of foul play.
